question:
Consider the following statements about the National Biogas and Manure Management Programme (NBMMP):
  1. The programme is being implemented under the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE)
  2. It is mainly catered to setting up of family type biogas plants.
  3. Under this programme, a fixed amount in the form of central subsidy is provided to biogas plants
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The National Biogas & Manure Management Programme (NBMMP) is being implemented under the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE). The ministry through the State Nodal Agencies and departments spreads awareness about the programme. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The programme is mainly catered to setting up of family type biogas plants. As per latest available data, under the NBMMP, about 49.6 lakh household size biogas plants have been installed since the inception of the National Biogas Programme in the country. <u>Third statement is also correct</u>. National Biogas and Manure Management Programme provide for central subsidy in fixed amounts, turn-key job fee linked with three years\' free maintenance warranty; financial support for repair of old-non functional plants; training of users, masons, entrepreneurs, etc.
